title: Business Consultant (Agente di Commercio)
description:
About the job
Chi siamo:
Dermalogica è il brand di skincare professionale n.1 al mondo.
Presente in più di 100 Paesi ha rivoluzionato il settore cosmetico divenendo il marchio leader nello skincare professionale sin dalla sua prima comparsa sul mercato nel 1986, anno in cui furono lanciate le sue esclusive formule che univano i più potenti fitoattivi naturali alle scienze cosmeceutiche più avanzate, prive di sostanze irritanti tra cui alcol, lanolina, oli minerali, nichel, glutine, coloranti e fragranze artificiali.
La fondatrice del marchio, Jane Wurwand, da allora ha continuato a sviluppare nuovi prodotti in grado di fornire ai clienti soluzioni personalizzate, efficaci nel trattare le esigenze di ogni tipo di pelle e garantire risultati concreti per una cute sana che brilli di salute.
Dermalogica è approdata in Italia nel 2018 e la sede italiana si distingue per un contesto dinamico ed innovativo, caratterizzato da una mentalità da start-up e da una forte cultura di diversity & inclusion che contraddistinguono l'intero team.

Siamo alla ricerca di Agenti di Commercio per le regioni Piemonte, Lombardia, Veneto, Toscana, Lazio e Emilia Romagna che sappiano dare il loro forte contributo nell'affermare questo marchio anche nel mercato italiano distinguendosi per proattività e passione per il proprio lavoro.

Chi cerchiamo:
Siamo alla ricerca di Agenti di Commercio che si occuperanno di sviluppare il business nella propria area di competenza, con l’obiettivo di identificare e acquisire nuovi potenziali clienti nel settore estetico e medico-estetico e sviluppare il portafoglio clienti forniti dall’azienda contribuendo agli obiettivi di crescita della stessa.

Principali Attività:
- Sviluppare la rete dei clienti in linea con l’offerta e la politica commerciale del
 brand;
- Sviluppare il fatturato sull’area di competenza in base agli obiettivi assegnati; - Fornire supporto e consulenza ai clienti;
- Mantenersi costantemente aggiornati sulle novità per poter offrire anche
 supporto tecnico ai clienti per un'attività di consulenza a 360° che ricopra
 anche le fasi di pre e post vendita.

Che competenze ricerchiamo:
- Esperienza nel settore estetico di almeno 5 anni sia su prodotti cosmetici che
 su tecnologie estetiche
- Orientamento al cliente unito a spiccate capacità comunicative e
 consulenziali;
- Conoscenza informatiche base (pacchetto Office, sistemi di CRM e
 gestionali);
- Costituisce titolo preferenziale possedere un portafoglio clienti attivo sull’area
 e settore di competenza;
- Costituisce requisito essenziale essere consulente in Partita Iva ed essere
 iscritto alla Fondazione Enasarco come agente o rappresentate di
 commercio;
- Rappresenta un plus essere in possesso della qualifica di estetista o
 visagista.

Cosa offriamo:
- Mandato in esclusiva sulla zona di competenza concordata con la direzione
 commerciale;
- Prodotti di alta gamma di sicuro impatto sul mercato;
- Formazione tecnica e affiancamento;
- Contesto lavorativo dinamico e all’avanguardia;
- Provvigioni e piano incentivi competitivi.

La selezione è aperta a persone di entrambi i sessi, secondo la legge 903/77 e 125/91. Dermalogica® si impegna a garantire le Pari Opportunità e dedica una particolare attenzione all’integrazione delle persone con disabilità all’interno dell’azienda. Tutte le posizioni aperte in Dermalogica® sono rivolte anche ai candidati appartenenti alle Categorie Protette l.68/99.

title: Consultant Strategy Execution (all genders are welcome)
description:
About the job
We are a Munich-based SaaS company and support leading enterprises with our software platform at every step from agile goal management with OKR to end-to-end strategy execution centered around outcomes. With the help of our technology, customers develop greater adaptability and effectiveness in strategy execution. This enables organizations to meet the demands of dynamic markets and a new working world. With user-centric workflow tools and its associated analytics suite, we link goals, metrics, and projects to center teams and organizations around shared outcomes. In addition, our international ecosystem of partners, training, events, and enablement content provides the desired culture change and internal knowledge building to holistically guide companies in their transformation.

Workpath is backed by industry experts with many years of experience in leadership and technology. Together we shape the future of work. Join us now!

Your future team

We are passionate about enabling large organizations to implement their strategies more efficiently. By changing their way of working, we empower them to provide every employee more focus and purpose in what they are doing. We value ownership, embrace pragmatism, like seeing the impact of our work and we are eager to learn something new every day - does this sound like you? Then join us at the forefront of driving Customer Success at Workpath.

Your meaningful outcomes 

First of all, we are not your typical SaaS company, and this is not a standard CSM role. As a Consultant Strategy Execution at Workpath, you will be responsible for a designated set of customers, ensuring they maximize the value they receive from us. You will guide them through transforming their strategy execution process and implementing the Workpath platform. This means your role ranges from being a change consultant and a strategy execution advisor to an account manager, ensuring a transition of our customers to outcome-focused organizations.

Your most important goals

Provide advice and guidance how to implement and establish the strategy execution process based on OKRs with the support of our solution and your expertise (every customer onboarding can be seen as individual transformation project)
Share insights on how to successfully and sustainably integrate OKRs with other existing processes (e.g KPIs, Performance Management, Project Management, Portfolio Management)
Identify customer needs and challenges from conversations and data-sets to position additional Workpath services or software offerings that will help them overcome these challenges

What else?

Define metrics to track your customers' success with the Workpath platform 
Facilitate Business Reviews to share valuable insights with your customers top-level Executives
Analyze customer data to avoid churn and drive adoption and retention
Collaborate with the Account Team (SDR, AE, CE) to strategically plan for renewals and expansions
Liaise between customers and our Product team to shape the future development of our strategy execution platform 

What We Are Looking For

Energy and motivation matter most to us, we do not believe there is a one-size-fits-all profile for this role. However, drawing from our team's experience, we have an idea what works well: You have worked in management consulting or a similar role. There you have gained experience in one or more areas such as strategy, strategy execution, transformation, change management, new work and/or agile methodologies. The only hard requirements we have is that you are an owner of your work, you can work independently and that you are an excellent communicator in German and English, conversing with senior leaders at ease.

What Sets You Up For Success In This Role

You embrace ownership and accountability, take charge and drive scalability for the Customer Success team
Your fast learning and pragmatic mindset helps you adapt to dynamic situations and create innovative formats and processes
You excel in a team environment, leveraging collective strengths but simultaneously thrive when working independently

Discover Our Perks And Benefits

Enjoy an attractive salary package with competitive OTE and VSOP, a public transportation allowance, a subsidy to your Urban Sports Club membership, as well as a personal development budget
Accelerate your growth with a steep learning curve through high responsibility from Day 1 and continuous coaching and mentoring from senior colleagues
Gain unique insights into Europe's leading companies and, their challenges in strategy execution and build a network with their top-level leaders
Work flexibly from our hubs in Munich and Berlin or the comfort of your home anywhere in Germany
Go explore the world with 40 days of workation per year thanks to our "Workpath Anywhere" program
Thrive in a dynamic agile work environment with a supportive team, open feedback culture and flat hierarchies
Recharge your batteries with initiatives like 2 Mental Health Days per year und free usage of OpenUp to support your mental health

Apply now!

Join our mission of shaping tomorrow's working world by unleashing the potential of millions of employees in businesses all over the world. We are looking forward to meeting you soon. In case you have any questions, don't hesitate to reach out to people@workpath.com

Hervorragende kommunikative und interaktive Fähigkeiten, welche Sie auf Aufsichtsrats- und Geschäftsleitungsebene wirkungsvoll zum Einsatz bringen
Problemlösungsorientierte, unternehmerische und stark analytische Persönlichkeit
Deutsch und Englisch verhandlungssicher, weitere Fremdsprachen von Vorteil

Wir sind eine der Ikonen der medizinisch fundierten Luxus-Kosmetik. QMS Medicosmetics ist eine Marke, die aus der Medizin heraus für den professionellen Bereich entwickelt wurde und nicht aus der Kosmetik. Die in zahlreichen klinischen Studien nachgewiesene Wirksamkeit unserer Skin Care Routinen überzeugt die besten Spas und Kosmetik-Institute der Welt. QMS Medicosmetics sitzt in Teningen bei Freiburg in Deutschland und ist im Besitz der privaten Beteiligungsgesellschaft Bluegem Capital Partners in London, die die erforderlichen Resources zur Verfügung stellt, damit das Unternehmen die Innovation in Produkte, Technologien und Dienstleistungen sowie die internationale Expansion des Unternehmens vorantreiben kann.

Umsetzung von Strategien und Vertriebskonzepten zur Erreichung Ihrer Umsatz- und Neukundenziele
Eigenverantwortliche Akquise neuer Kunden
Entwicklung des Sell-outs Ihrer Bestandskunden, die überwiegend langjährig und begeistert mit QMS arbeiten, mit gezielten Aktionen, Events und Trainings

Zweistellige Entwicklung des Umsatzes mit weiterhin starker Wachstumsperspektive; Erfolgreiche internationale Expansion innerhalb Europas, Nordamerikas und Asiens
Eine intensive Einarbeitung in die Philosophie unserer Marke, in die Eigenschaften und Nutzen unserer anspruchsvollen Produkte und Behandlungen sowie in unsere Systeme und Tools. Attraktives Grundgehalt und eine überzeugende, leistungsabhängige Bonusstruktur. Zuzahlung zu vermögenswirksamen Leistungen und betrieblicher Altersvorsorge. Möglichkeit, QMS und Produkte von Schwesterunternehmen zu sehr guten Preisen für den Eigenbedarf zu erwerben
Firmenfahrzeug, auch zur privaten Nutzung
Bereitschaft des Unternehmens in Ihre Entwicklung durch Coaching on-the-job und gezielte Trainings zu investieren
Mit dem Wachstum des Unternehmens einhergehende Möglichkeiten zur persönlichen Weiterentwicklung

Abgeschlossene kosmetische Ausbildung, alternativ eine kaufmännische Ausbildung im kosmetischen Fachhandel oder langjährige Erfahrung im Vertrieb von Kosmetik
Nachweislicher, erfolgreicher Ausbau von Verkaufsgebieten in der professionellen Hautpflege und Dienstleistung
Verhandlungsgeschick mit Abschlussstärke
Hohes Maß an Eigenmotivation und Engagement sowie die Fähigkeit, selbstständig zu arbeiten
Gepflegte Erscheinung und Eloquenz
Bereitschaft, während der Woche vor Ort bei Ihren Kunden zu sein
Sicherer Umgang mit gängigen Office-Anwendungen
Verhandlungssicheres Deutsch und gute Englischkenntnisse, weitere Sprachen von Vorteil

title: Business Consultant
description:
About the job
Bloomreach is the world’s #1 Commerce Experience Cloud, empowering brands to deliver customer journeys so personalized, they feel like magic. It offers a suite of products that drive true personalization and digital commerce growth, including:

Discovery, offering AI-driven search and merchandising 
Content, offering a headless CMS 
Engagement, offering a leading CDP and marketing automation solutions 


Together, these solutions combine the power of unified customer and product data with the speed and scale of AI optimization, enabling revenue-driving digital commerce experiences that convert on any channel and every journey. Bloomreach serves over 850 global brands including Albertsons, Bosch, Puma, FC Bayern München, and Marks & Spencer. Bloomreach recently raised $175 million in a Series F funding round, bringing its total valuation to $2.2 billion. The investment was led by Goldman Sachs Asset Management with participation from Bain Capital Ventures and Sixth Street Growth. For more information, visit Bloomreach.com.

Become a Business Consultant (US hours) at Bloomreach! If you want to help top e-commerce businesses boost their performance, serve clients and get experience globally and have immediate, tangible results, join our Professional Services team as a Business Consultant. Your salary starts at 2 200€ per month, along with stock options and other benefits. You might work in one of our Central European offices or from home on a full-time basis.

Tasks and responsibilities:

As a business consultant you will be responsible for delivering value to Bloomreach’s clients through the deployment and use of our Engagement Platform
You will be supporting clients in the implementation phase with business requirements gathering, preparation of the data structure, data migration process and automated programes deployment
You will be a key advisor for clients regarding e -commerce, analytics, data management, digital marketing, marketing automation and emailing + mobile technologies
You will be responsible for building strong relationships with clients by bringing continuous improvement to their business, maximising utilization of the platform and improving their KPIs/ROI
 In a collaboration with Customer Success Manager you will be responsible for developing business strategy and a roadmap with clients as well as aligning with them on relevant business goals and critical metrics
On top of the overall knowledge, you will become an expert in chosen part of the platform in order to lead and advise clients and internal stakeholders in a given topic of expertise
You will play a pivotal role in clients’ onboarding, platform adoption and product features utilization
You will be collaborating with various internal teams to build services focused around the product and contribute for internal process improvement
You will be supporting our US based clients working US hours: 3 pm - 12 am


What we expect of the candidate:

Ideally 2-3 years of experience in a consulting role within a SaaS environment
Working knowledge of at least one of email, sms, social ads in the marketplace, etc.
Experience in the following sectors/fields: online analytics, performance marketing, marketing automation, data science, A/B testing, personalisation, campaign optimisation, customer lifetime value, e-mailing automation, reactivation, attribution modelling, prediction, product recommendations, e-commerce
Knowledge of ecommerce business and business trends, and the ability to understand clients’ business models and adapt consulting approach accordingly
Excellent consulting skills: clear written and verbal communication, presentation skills, confidence in dealing with business users and stakeholders at all levels of seniority, exceptional organizational skills, proactive problem solving skills
Ability to handle difficult situations in a proactive, goal-oriented, and highly professional way
Proactively maintain the highest level of expertise by deepening your knowledge of the Bloomreach Engagement platform and solutions through internally and externally available learning opportunities, as well as self-study
Native or professional fluency in English.


More things you'll like about Bloomreach:

Culture:

A great deal of freedom and trust. At Bloomreach we don’t clock in and out, and we have neither corporate rules nor long approval processes. This freedom goes hand in hand with responsibility. We are interested in results from day one. 
We have defined our 5 values and the 10 underlying key behaviors that we strongly believe in. We can only succeed if everyone lives these behaviors day to day. We've embedded them in our processes like recruitment, onboarding, feedback, personal development, performance review and internal communication. 
We believe in flexible working hours to accommodate your working style. 
We work remote-first with several Bloomreach Hubs available across three continents. 
We organize company events to experience the global spirit of the company and get excited about what's ahead. 
We encourage and support our employees to engage in volunteering activities - every Bloomreacher can take 5 paid days off to volunteer*.
The Bloomreach Glassdoor page elaborates on our stellar 4.6/5 rating. The Bloomreach Comparably page Culture score is even higher at 4.9/5 


Personal Development:

We have a People Development Program -- participating in personal development workshops on various topics run by experts from inside the company. We are continuously developing & updating competency maps for select functions. 
Our resident communication coach Ivo Večeřa is available to help navigate work-related communications & decision-making challenges.*
Our managers are strongly encouraged to participate in the Leader Development Program to develop in the areas we consider essential for any leader. The program includes regular comprehensive feedback, consultations with a coach and follow-up check-ins. 
Bloomreachers utilize the $1,500 professional education budget on an annual basis to purchase education products (books, courses, certifications, etc.)* 


Well-being:

The Employee Assistance Program -- with counselors -- is available for non-work-related challenges.* 
Subscription to Calm - sleep and meditation app.* 
We organize ‘DisConnect’ days where Bloomreachers globally enjoy one additional day off each quarter, allowing us to unwind together and focus on activities away from the screen with our loved ones. 
We facilitate sports, yoga, and meditation opportunities for each other. 


Compensation:

Restricted Stock Units or Stock Options are granted depending on a team member’s role, seniority, and location.* 
Everyone gets to participate in the company's success through the company performance bonus.* 
We offer an employee referral bonus of up to $3,000 paid out immediately after the new hire starts. 
We celebrate work anniversaries -- Bloomversaries!* 


(*Subject to employment type. Interns are exempt from marked benefits, usually for the first 6 months.)

If this position doesn't suit you, but you know someone who might be a great fit, share it - we will be very grateful!

Any unsolicited resumes/candidate profiles submitted through our website or to personal email accounts of employees of Bloomreach are considered property of Bloomreach and are not subject to payment of agency fees.

title: Adoption&Change Senior Consultant
description:

Insight est un fournisseur leader de solutions informatiques qui aide les entreprises du secteur privé et public dans le monde entier à améliorer leurs performances et évolutions technologiques.

Que ce soit des solutions Cloud, data center, mobilité, réseaux et sécurité, notre modèle unique combine une gamme de services avancés. Nous offrons également tous les services nécessaires à leurs bonnes mises en place et à la transformation digitale des entreprises ce qui inclut la conduite du changement et l’adoption des outils et les services managés.

Avec plus de 11000 collaborateurs présents dans 180 pays, nos ressources commerciales et techniques apportent les compétences essentielles qui permettent à nos clients de mettre en œuvre des solutions efficaces.

Dans le cadre de notre plan stratégique, Insight France nous renforçons significativement nos équipes pour répondre à nos ambitions de croissance.

En tant que Senior Consultant Change&Assistance à Maîtrise d'Ouvrage (AMOA) et rattaché à la BU Services Consulting, vous aurez pour missions :

Porter des projets d'accompagnement au changement et/ou d'AMOA auprès de nos clients, et en collaboration avec les autres équipes Insight (technique, UX…)
Garantir l'adoption des solutions par les clients et démontrer son expertise à travers l’animation d’événements et la création des livrables (personae, supports de communication / formation…)
Collecter les besoins métier et identifier les cas d'usage prioritaires, au travers d'ateliers participatifs
Etablir et formaliser des recommandations d'actions sur la base des éléments récoltés (plans d'accompagnement, notes de cadrage…)
Porter la voix des métiers, convaincre les décisionnaires et les mobiliser dans la mise en œuvre des plans d'action
Mettre en œuvre des méthodologies éprouvées (PROSCI, design thinking…) sur les projets clients
Soutien aux utilisateurs dans les étapes de qualification, animation de recette et tests avant intégration et déploiement
Suivre et mesurer l'impact des actions engagées (à travers des sondages, tableaux de bord, etc.)
Réaliser des benchmarks sur des solutions du marché
Contribuer au développement des practices Change&AMOA au sein d'Insight (capitalisation, outils, processus…)
Former, coacher des consultants et accélérer leur montée en compétence

Profil recherché

De formation Supérieure type Bac+5
Expérience d’au moins 5 ans sur un poste similaire
Maîtrise des méthodes d’accompagnement au changement (certification PROSCI serait un plus) et d'Assistance à Maîtrise d'Ouvrage (AMOA)
Forte capacité à engager et mobiliser les équipes et à gérer les ressources pour réaliser un projet ou une tâche
Fortes capacités de communication (orale et écrite, en Français et en Anglais) et d'écoute active
Compréhension des défis stratégiques et des impacts opérationnels de la transformation digitale au sein des entreprises
Capacité à s'organiser, solliciter les bonnes expertises et à gérer plusieurs activités en parallèle
Capacité à promouvoir des programmes et des initiatives autour de la conduite du changement et des besoins métiers
Compétences analytiques et rédactionnelles avancées, avec un esprit de synthèse
Sens du service et esprit d’équipe
Sensibilité commerciale, expérience d'avant-ventes (analyse, rédaction, soutenance…)
Recherche de l'excellence et de l'amélioration continue
Veille technologique
Rigueur et pédagogie
Connaissance de l'environnement Microsoft 365

Les plus Insight

Une activité qui se développe et se renforce, avec des managers disponibles et à l'écoute (Great Place to Work 2021)
La possibilité d'évoluer au sein d'un groupe international en pleine croissance, avec des valeurs fortes
Des parcours de carrière sur-mesure, avec des formations adaptées à votre profil
Environnement de travail hybride (présentiel et à distance)

A propos d'Insight: 

Nous sommes convaincus qu'en vous donnant la liberté de voir grand et en vous donnant les moyens d'atteindre votre plein potentiel, nous obtiendrons ensemble les meilleurs résultats. Outre d'excellents avantages sociaux et un programme de récompenses attrayant, nous vous offrons la possibilité de travailler dans un environnement favorable, avec un niveau élevé d'autonomie et de créativité - ce n'est pas pour rien que la durée moyenne d'occupation de nos employés est supérieure à 6 ans.

Nous nous efforçons d'afficher chaque jour nos trois valeurs fondamentales, à savoir la faim, le cœur et l'harmonie. Ces valeurs représentent et guident ce que nous sommes ici à Insight et, ce faisant, nous réalisons des choses étonnantes. Insight a débuté dans un garage en 1988 et c'est en exploitant nos trois valeurs fondamentales que deux frères, Eric et Tim Crown, ont dirigé Insight vers la société Fortune 500 qu'elle est aujourd'hui. Nous sommes aujourd'hui une entreprise de services et de solutions informatiques globales, passionnée par l'aide aux clients et aux personnes qui se trouvent derrière eux.

Détails de l'application: 

Insight est un employeur soucieux de l'égalité des chances et nous nous sommes engagés à réaliser la diversité et l'égalité au sein de notre organisation. Nous recherchons des personnes d'origines diverses et nous vous encourageons à postuler.

Nous nous efforcerons de vous contacter dans les cinq jours ouvrables, si nous estimons que votre profil correspond bien à ce poste. Si vous n'avez pas de nouvelles de nous dans ce délai, veuillez supposer qu'à cette occasion, votre candidature n'a pas été retenue.

Une description complète du poste vous sera fournie lors de votre candidature.
